alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deerfield Beach, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Tamarac, Margate, Lighthouse Point, Highland Beach, Coconut Creek, Oakland Park, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Hillsboro Beach, Mission Bay, Broadview-Pompano Park, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton and Village Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
